title: Requires the MTA to file a copy of proposed station closings with various governmental agencies
summary: Requires the MTA to file a copy of proposed station closings with various governmental agencies; provides that the MTA hold public hearing on any proposed closings; allows the MTA to not comply with the filing provisions for emergency repairs or repairs that cause the station to close for less than twenty-four hours.
